TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SubsetMatchingMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 枚举匹配模式的子集值。

span.span: Enumerates values of subset matching mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 System.Speech，您可以构造成功识别的短语，即使在音频的输入中找到其内容的一个子集语法。In System.Speech, you can construct a grammar that successfully recognizes a phrase even though only a subset of its contents is found in the audio input. 默认情况下，识别引擎要求整个短语完全匹配。By default, a recognition engine requires an exact match against an entire phrase. 识别引擎还可以匹配根据定义的参数部分短语用作的自变量的成员或构造函数，或方法。The recognition engine can also match partial phrases according to parameters defined by a member used as an argument to the or constructors, or the method. 以下说明如何每个的成员影响识别包含短语语法中使用"一辆汽车的平面的船舶卡车"时。The following illustrates how each of the members affects recognition when used in a grammar that contains the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane". **OrderedSubset****OrderedSubset** 此模式下指示短语的子集将用于成功识别整个短语，如果符合以下条件：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 短语中的一个或多个单词在音频的输入中识别。One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input. - 这些可识别的单词的相对顺序是与短语中的相同。The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase. - 匹配的单词可能只能包含介词和文章。Matched words may consist of only prepositions and articles. 添加使用 OrderedSubset 语法短语"car 的平面的船舶 truck"模式产生识别以下结果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using OrderedSubset mode produces the following result on recognition: |**输入的短语****Input Phrase**|**结果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"一辆汽车的平面的船舶卡车""a car the truck a boat that plane"|整个短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"将被识别。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"一辆汽车的船舶卡车""a car the truck a boat"|整个短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"将被识别。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"一辆汽车的平面""a car the that plane"|整个短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"将被识别。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 识别的子集不需要是一串的原始字符串。A recognized subset is not required to be a sequence of the original string.| |"一辆汽车的平面的卡车船""a car the boat a truck that plane"|识别未成功。Recognition is not successful. 单词是无序的。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|整个短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"将被识别。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 介词和文章将用于识别。Prepositions and articles are used for recognition.| **OrderedSubsetContentRequired****OrderedSubsetContentRequired** 此模式下指示短语的子集将用于成功识别整个短语，如果符合以下条件：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 在的音频的输入中识别的短语中的一个或多个单词和One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input, and - 这些可识别的单词的相对顺序是与短语中的相同。The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase. - 匹配的单词不能包含仅介词和文章。Matched words cannot consist of only prepositions and articles. 添加使用 OrderedSubsetContentRequired 语法短语"car 的平面的船舶 truck"模式产生识别以下结果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using OrderedSubsetContentRequired mode produces the following result on recognition: |**输入的短语****Input Phrase**|**结果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"一辆汽车的平面的船舶卡车""a car the truck a boat that plane"|整个短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"将被识别。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"一辆汽车的船舶卡车""a car the truck a boat"|整个短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"将被识别。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"一辆汽车的平面""a car the that plane"|整个短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"将被识别。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 识别的子集不需要是一串的原始字符串。A recognized subset is not required to be a sequence of the original string.| |"一辆汽车的平面的卡车船""a car the boat a truck that plane"|识别未成功。Recognition is not successful. 单词是无序的。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|识别未成功。Recognition is not successful. 语音输入必须包含文章和介词以外的单词。Speech input must contain words other than articles and prepositions.| **子序列：****Subsequence:** 此模式下指示短语的子集将用于成功识别整个短语，如果符合以下条件：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 短语中的一个或多个单词在音频的输入中识别为这个短语： 的序列和One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input as a sequence of the phrase, and - 这些可识别的单词的相对顺序是与短语中的相同。The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase. - 匹配的单词可能只能包含介词和文章。Matched words may consist of only prepositions and articles. 使用子序列模式语法添加短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"产生识别以下结果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using Subsequence mode produces the following result on recognition: |**输入的短语****Input Phrase**|**结果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"一辆汽车的平面的船舶卡车""a car the truck a boat that plane"|整个短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"将被识别。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"一辆汽车的船舶卡车""a car the truck a boat"|整个短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"将被识别。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"一辆汽车的平面""a car the that plane"|识别未成功。Recognition is not successful. 识别的子集需要是一串的原始字符串。A recognized subset is required to be a sequence of the original string.| |"一辆汽车的平面的卡车船""a car the boat a truck that plane"|识别未成功。Recognition is not successful. 单词是无序的。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|整个短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"将被识别。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 介词和文章将用于识别。Prepositions and articles are used for recognition.| **SubsequenceContentRequired****SubsequenceContentRequired** 此模式下指示短语的子集将用于成功识别整个短语，如果符合以下条件：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 将匹配字符串中的一个或多个单词中的音频的输入被识别为短语序列。One or more words in the match string are recognized in the audio input as a sequence of the phrase. - 匹配的单词不能包含仅介词和文章。Matched words cannot consist of only prepositions and articles. 添加使用 SubsequenceContentRequired 语法短语"car 的平面的船舶 truck"模式产生识别以下结果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using SubsequenceContentRequired mode produces the following result on recognition: |**输入的短语****Input Phrase**|**结果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"一辆汽车的平面的船舶卡车""a car the truck a boat that plane"|整个短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"将被识别。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"一辆汽车的船舶卡车""a car the truck a boat"|整个短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"将被识别。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"一辆汽车的平面""a car the that plane"|识别未成功。Recognition is not successful. 识别的子集需要是一串的原始字符串。A recognized subset is required to be a sequence of the original string.| |"一辆汽车的平面的卡车船""a car the boat a truck that plane"|识别未成功。Recognition is not successful. 单词是无序的。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|识别未成功。Recognition is not successful. 语音输入必须包含文章和介词以外的单词。Speech input must contain words other than articles and prepositions.| ## Examples 下面是一个测试例程，后者将生成四个对象，为每个使用相同的短语， `SubsetMatchingModes`。Below is a test routine which generates four objects, using the same phrase, for each of the `SubsetMatchingModes`. 这些对象然后可以进行测试。These objects can then be tested. ``` private void CreateSubsetMatchTest() { foreach ( System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode mode in Enum.GetValues(typeof(System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode))) { GrammarBuilder gb = new GrammarBuilder("a car the truck a boat that plane",mode); Grammar grammar = new Grammar(gb); grammar.Name = mode.ToString(); grammar.Enabled=true; _recognizer.LoadGrammar(grammar); } } ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode OrderedSubset = int32(1)

summary.span: 指示子集匹配模式是 OrderedSubset。

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **OrderedSubset**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode OrderedSubsetContentRequired = int32(3)

summary.span: 指示子集匹配模式是 OrderedSubsetContentRequired。

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **OrderedSubsetContentRequired**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode Subsequence = int32(0)

summary.span: 指示子集匹配模式是 Subsequence。

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **Subsequence**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode SubsequenceContentRequired = int32(2)

summary.span: 指示子集匹配模式是 SubsequenceContentRequired。

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **SubsequenceContentRequired**.
